content: Sitting alone in the rain
One day you came and sat by me
When I looked up
You smiled and said hello
And I saw your pretty face
I never knew what it would be
I never knew you'd care for me
When I think of how it's changed
For better or worse, we'll have to see
All those times you looked at me that way
Yeah, I know everything will be okay
Everything will be okay
Thinking of your smile
It hurts to see you cry
All those times you were sad
You never told me why
I know that we are still growing
Not knowing what's to come
But only God knows what He has in store for us
When I think of how it's changed
For better or worse, we'll have to see
All those times you looked at me that way
Yeah, I know everything will be okay
Everything will be okay
